mapper.select: SELECT IR.INPTNT_NO , IR.INPTNT_DE FROM INPATIENT_RECORD IR JOIN HOSPITALIZATION H ON IR.HSPTLZ_CD = H.HSPTLZ_CD WHERE H.PATNT_NO = #{patntNo} ORDER BY IR.INPTNT_DE DESC
SELECT clnic_no , clnic_time FROM clinic WHERE patnt_no = #{patntNo} ORDER BY clnic_time DESC
SELECT OTPT_CD , MDLRT_DT FROM OTPT_RECORD WHERE patnt_no = #{patntNo} ORDER BY MDLRT_DT DESC
SELECT NRS_RCORD_CD , NRS_RCORD_DE FROM NURSE_RECORD WHERE PATNT_NO = #{patntNo} AND NRS_RCORD_CD LIKE 'NRM%' ORDER BY NRS_RCORD_DE DESC

SELECT C.clnic_no , C.rcept_no , C.patnt_no , C.emp_no , C.clnic_time , C.clnic_cn , C.clnic_at , C.before_clnic_no , C.hsptlz_at , C.clnic_memo , C.atfss_dt , C.clnic_fe , H.hsptlz_cd , H.hsptlz_sckrm , H.hsptlz_sckbd , H.hsptlz_de , H.prarnde_lhstl , H.real_lhstl , P.patnt_nm , P.patnt_sexdstn , P.PATNT_AGE , E.EMP_NM FROM clinic C LEFT JOIN hospitalization H ON C.clnic_no = H.clnic_no JOIN PATIENT P ON P.PATNT_NO = C.PATNT_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE C.CLNIC_NO = #{clnicNo}
SELECT sckwnd_cd , clnic_no , rcept_no , patnt_no , sckwnd_kr , sckwnd_en , body_cd , kcd , sckwnd_se FROM sick_and_wounded WHERE CLNIC_NO = #{clnicNo}
SELECT M.*, H.HLTHCHKP_NM as hlthchkpNm FROM MEDICAL_EXAMINATION_ORDER M JOIN HEALTH_CHECKUP H ON M.HLTHCHKP_CD = H.HLTHCHKP_CD WHERE M.CLNIC_NO = #{clnicNo}
SELECT clnic_no , rcept_no , medcin_cd , prscrptn_nm , mdctn_cpcty , mdctn_unit , mdctn_co , mdctn_pd , mdctn_cours_usage , prscrptn_cd FROM prescription_order WHERE CLNIC_NO = #{clnicNo}

SELECT IR.inptnt_no , IR.hsptlz_cd , IR.inptnt_de , IR.inptnt_empno , IR.doctr_empno , E.EMP_NM , P.PATNT_NM , IR.inptnt_rcord FROM inpatient_record IR LEFT JOIN HOSPITALIZATION H ON IR.HSPTLZ_CD = H.HSPTLZ_CD JOIN PATIENT P ON P.PATNT_NO = H.PATNT_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = IR.doctr_empno WHERE inptnt_no = #{inptntNo}

SELECT NR.nrs_rcord_cd , NR.nrs_rcord_de , NR.nrs_rcord_wrter , NR.nrs_rcord_cn , NR.nrs_rcord_memo , NR.clnic_no , NR.rcept_no , NR.patnt_no , P.PATNT_NM , E.EMP_NM FROM nurse_record NR LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = NR.NRS_RCORD_WRTER JOIN PATIENT P ON P.patnt_no = NR.patnt_no WHERE nrs_rcord_cd = #{nrsRcordCd}

SELECT ORD.otpt_cd , ORD.clnic_no , ORD.rcept_no , ORD.patnt_no , P.PATNT_NM , P.PATNT_SEXDSTN , ORD.otpt_appeal , ORD.otpt_history , ORD.orient_time , ORD.orient_place , ORD.orient_person , ORD.otpt_stm , ORD.otpt_ltm , ORD.otpt_st , ORD.otpt_dysp , ORD.otpt_pd , ORD.must_ub_right , ORD.must_ub_left , ORD.must_lb_right , ORD.must_lb_left , ORD.main_cntrvs , ORD.lngtr_coal , ORD.srtpd_coal , ORD.must_plan , ORD.must_etc , ORD.mdlrt_dt FROM otpt_record ORD LEFT JOIN PATIENT P ON ORD.PATNT_NO = P.PATNT_NO WHERE ORD.otpt_cd = #{otptCd}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM VITALS WHERE PATNT_NO = #{patntNo} ORDER BY VITAL_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
